title: 14 Day Suspention not expired
body:
Hey, I got a 14 Day suspention on my account in 2017. I quit League after that.

Now I decided to log in again. I open the client, log in, get the window with my chat and the title "14-Day Suspention". The 14 Day suspention should expire on 10 December 2017.
Yet if I click "I Understand" I still can't play and the client will not connect me to the chat. I am really confused.

Thank you for any help

https://i.imgur.com/Y4xR3Uq.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/8VLcBvo.jpg

replies.body: That is really strange. Try submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Did you try logging out and back in?

based on the duetch in your post, The NA boards most likely won't help you.

this should be in Bugs or Fixes
And also based on that, Iâ€™d assume this is simply a time zone issue.

oops, I'm sorry. Got redirected here from reddit and did not see the "NA".
